Description: Papyrus; Demotic administrative text recto and verso.
Curator's comments: To be published by E. Cruz-Uribe. Description, partially publication: Cruz-Uribe, Eugene, A Note on the Early Demotic Grain Formula, in: Enchoria 17 (1990), p. 55-68, Taf. 3-4.
Registartion number recorded in Egyptian Numbers Book, but apparently not in registers. To be studied by Claus Jurman, as part of Dphil.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (51134) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/51134)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bloom, brittle, deposit, discoloured, fractured, insect attack, loss Black ink Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
